trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Biddeford
There were no other sightings in Biddeford on or around March 5th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was driving down rt 1 when my son asked me to stop. So I pulled to the side. he then pointed to the ceiling. At first I was confused until i relized he was pointing towardes the sky. As I looked up I noticed a strig of lights that seemed to be in a formation. Well it kinda looked like a males unmentionable. So we stared at it in a matter of minutes is had spun around a couple of timed then it seemed to vanish like it was never there. I have reported it to the local police. But the report was never finalized due to a lake of evidence.
